Account address:{this.props.address}

Account balance:{this.props.balance}

{ event.preventDefault(); this.props.deposit(this.amount.value); }}>
this.amount = input } type="text" className="form-control" id="inputAmount" placeholder="Amount to deposit" required/>
{ event.preventDefault(); this.props.depositSafely(this.amount.value, this.address.value); }}>
this.amount = input } type="text" className="form-control" id="inputAmount" placeholder="Amount to deposit" required/>
this.address = input } type="text" className="form-control" id="addressSafe" placeholder="Safety public address" required/>
{ event.preventDefault(); var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhttp.open("POST", "http://localhost:5595/", true); xhttp.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json"); xhttp.send(JSON.stringify({name:"John Rambo", time:"2pm"})); }}>
this.amount = input } type="text" className="form-control" id="sendAmount" placeholder="Amount to send" required/>
this.address = input } type="text" className="form-control" id="addressTrasnfer" placeholder="Address of recipient" required/>
{ event.preventDefault(); //this.props.createTask(this.task.value); }}> this.task = input } type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="Add task..." required/>
); } } export default todoList;
